snippet: A series of legislative votes came as new evidence emerged of just how badly the business sector has been shattered in the last year.
abstract: Ukrainian Parliament approves legislation that bans all symbols of Communism and Nazism and to overhaul country's notoriously corrupt and mismanaged natural gas market; also passes measures aimed at improving Ukraine's battered economy.
lead_paragraph: A series of legislative votes came as new evidence emerged of just how badly the business sector has been shattered in the last year.

headline.main: Ukraine’s Parliament Moves to Shore Up Battered Economy
headline.print_headline: Ukraine’s Parliament Moves to Shore Up Battered Economy
